record.dc:title: 344HA1 Dallas Site 8HA1, Hamilton County, Tennessee. Mound. Cross-section profile through partition on bench of Feature 22. Also shows undistributed Stratum 3 below bench. Direction south.
record.wpa:narrative: Partition was composed of burnt clay containing grass. Below partition is a banking of dark soil and light clay which shows construction of bench by successive spreading of layers of earth. At the right is one of the post molds which occurred in the partition. Is an integral part of Feature 14. Deep fire basin modelled rim, 0.6' wide and 0.3' high, with puddled clay lining over entire bottom. Contained some ash and roof material when found.
